title: Grade 7 World History and Geography Standards
subject: Social Studies (2024-)

1A8C9028662B406991625B52932641B7.description:

societal implications of cultural
diffusion.

understanding cause‐and‐effect
relationships in history.

shape interpretations of the past.

and civilizations.

2FA20AFA0CC64416A9E2154854B8BC26.description:

importation, and the impact of local
events on the global economy.

arise during wars.

features, climate, and available resources

conclusions.
